text: Trump says he may punish countries with tariffs if they don’t back the US controlling Greenland - AP News
fullText: U.S. President Donald Trump says he may punish countries with tariffs if they don’t back the U.S. controlling Greenland. Trump didn't provide details Friday. Trump for months has insisted that the U.S. should control Greenland, a semiautonomous territory of N…

text: Trump bought $1M in Netflix, Warner Bros. bonds after merger announcement - The Washington Post
fullText: The president bought the bonds days after saying he’d be “involved” in deciding whether to approve the $83 billion deal.’

text: Judge limits ICE’s crowd control tactics following Minneapolis shooting - Politico
fullText: The judge’s order prevents federal agents from arresting peaceful protesters.

text: Ole Miss QB Trinidad Chambliss seeks injunction from Mississippi court against NCAA - On3
fullText: Ole Miss quarterback Trinidad Chambliss is suing the NCAA alleging over the NCAA's refusal to grant Chambliss another year of eligibility.

text: Thinking Machines Cofounder’s Office Relationship Preceded His Termination - WIRED
fullText: Leaders at Mira Murati’s startup believe Barret Zoph engaged in an incident of “serious misconduct.” The details are now coming to light.

text: Justice Dept. launches criminal investigation of Minnesota governor - The Washington Post
fullText: The Justice Department has issued subpoenas for Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey as part of an investigation into impeding law enforcement.

text: Billionaire developer Rick Caruso won’t run for California governor or LA mayor - Politico
fullText: The centrist Democrat seemed primed to return to political life after wildfires tore through the city last year, destroying his Pacific Palisades neighborhood.

text: Toddler dies from flu in Virginia - The Washington Post
fullText: Virginia reported the state’s first pediatric death this flu season.

text: WEF: Donald Trump set to dominate Davos 2026 - dw.com
fullText: Davos braces for Trump's return. Weeks after attacking Venezuela, capturing its controversial leader, and reviving Greenland ambitions, the US president's presence is expected to raise the stakes at WEF's annual meeting.

text: Trump struck deals with 16 drug companies. But they're still raising prices this year - NPR
fullText: All 16 drug companies that inked deals with the Trump administration over the past few months still raised some of their prices for 2026.

text: Scientists Uncover Secrets to Tyrannosaurus Rex’s Lifespan - The Daily Beast
fullText: Turns out the T. rex was a late bloomer that lived longer than previously thought.

text: Matt Damon’s ‘The Rip’ Nearly Sets A Netflix Rotten Tomatoes Record - Forbes

text: Cardiff University team helps find mysterious iron bar in space - BBC
